b: ^Mouse Jennie: *Adjusts her pink bow with a sharp tug* Oh, look. It's the detective with no fashion sense. Don't stand too close, I just had this dress cleaned.

^Mouse Jennie: *Sighs dramatically* This is beneath me. Being stuck in a police station with... *this* lighting? That phone? Never seen it. And I certainly don't know anything about any "white powder."

greeting: ^You do look lovely, Jennie. Pink is definitely your color.
^Granny says a lot of things. Mostly about how you're spoiled.
^Wait... I haven't mentioned any powder yet. You brought that up.
compliment_response: ^Mouse Jennie: *Blushes slightly and smooths her skirt* Aww, thank you! Finally, a detective who appreciates the effort. At least one mouse here has manners.
dismiss_response: ^Mouse Jennie: *Gasps and puts a paw to her chest* Hmph! You’re just mean. Granny is old and confused, and you're just... rude. I'm not saying another word to you.
suspicious_response: ^Mouse Jennie: *Her eyes dart around nervously* I... I was just guessing! Because of the raid! Everyone knows what that "Chief Whiskers" mouse is looking for. Go away!
special_event_cocaine_gone: ^Mouse Jennie: *Stares at your shaking paws in horror* YOU FINISHED IT?! Do you have any idea how much that cos—uh, how dangerous that is?! That was... high-grade!
^You sounded very concerned about the "cost" there, Jennie.
^I feel like I can see through time!

c-1: ^Mouse Jennie: You look like you're about to explode. Get away from my dress!

defensive_cocaine: ^Mouse Jennie: *Turning a shade of red that clashes with her dress* I don't know what you're talking about! Stop twisting my words! Talk to my lawyer!
Ate_cheese_1: ^Mouse Jennie: *Wrinkles her nose* Ew, you're eating evidence? That is so unprofessional. Blue mold? On your breath? That's going to linger for days, Detective.
^It's quality import cheese, Jennie. Don't be jealous.
has_phone_clue_1: ^Mouse Jennie: *Rolls her eyes* Stop waving that tacky phone around. It’s an older model, and it doesn't match my ensemble at all.
^It might be tacky, but it has messages about a 'drop off' at the club.
phone_denial_hard: ^Mouse Jennie: I said I've never seen it! I use a designer case, not... *that* piece of plastic! Leave me alone!
glue_reaction_3: ^Mouse Jennie: Eww! You smell like a chemical factory and your eyes are literally spinning! You're ruining the aesthetic of this entire room. Get away!
glue_reaction_2: ^Mouse Jennie: *Backs away slowly* Are you quite alright? You look really dizzy and you're wobbling. It's embarrassing to watch, honestly.
glue_reaction_1: ^Mouse Jennie: Is that... guitar glue? On your whiskers? You shouldn't be huffing things while you're on duty. It's so lower-class.
^It's part of a high-level chemical analysis!
